apps.name: Sora
apps.subtitle: An iOS and macOS modular web scraping app.
apps.versionDescription:
**Commit - 1f3ea9c**
###Changes:
- bug fixes + optimization buffer indicator
- snappier pause unpause buttons (animations are the same)
- buffer indicator and bar fixes
- player optmizations
- beautiful title text in the player
apps.localizedDescription: An iOS and macOS modular web scraping app, under the GPLv3.0 License.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Sora may require access to your device camera.
